channel.description: Best practices for OIN apps Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: Completely new doc with new content Target personas: New IAM Developers, Developers new to Okta Description: OIN best practices. Why is this here?: At Oktane, the OIN Survey showed several customers citing the following as “Missing info with the OIN Docs”: Best practices and use cases Best security practices for the app specific guidelines for each app Internal Workshop: When asked “What prevents devs from being successful on the OIN, respondents answered:
